long_description: The Warm Fuzzy seat cover helps smooth your child's ride and helps facilitate something children do well in strollers--sleep! Thick polypropylene fleece combined with padded quilting provides sweet plushness. New design offers easier installation with hook-and-loop attachments at the openings. Warm Fuzzy works with both single and double strollers (works with individual seats of Duallie strollers). Compatible with all BOB strollers and many other brands.
short_description: The Warm Fuzzy seat cover helps smooth your child's ride and helps facilitate something children do well in strollers--sleep!
